channel.description: Recent content in bundler on Memo Tut

item.title: Python environment tools comparison chart for Rubyist
item.description: #Introduction There are various Python version/library management and it is complicated. It seems easy for Rubyist to think “what is said in Ruby?”, so I will summarize the current mainstream Python environment management. Simplified chart Target Ruby Python Version rbenv pyenv Library gem pip Library dependent/virtual environment bundler pipenv version control Rubyist has the same rbenv, and Python has pyenv.
